sentences.en: Five young workers have been assigned to our workshop.
sentences.cn: 拨了5名青年工人到我们车间.

sentences.en: He bolted down a few mouthful of food and hurried back to the workshop.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆忙忙吃了几口东西,又回车间去了.

sentences.en: He has been transferred to be head of a workshop.
He turned round and headed for the workshop.
sentences.cn: 他扭转身子,向车间走去.

sentences.en: He'll chair a weekend workshop on politics.
sentences.cn: 他将主持一次周末政治研讨会.

sentences.en: His workshop connected with a small building in the garden.
sentences.cn: 他的工作间连着花园里的一栋小楼。

sentences.en: My son is an apprentice in a furniture maker's workshop.
sentences.cn: 我的儿子在一家家具厂做学徒.

sentences.en: Smoking is out in the workshop.
The forewomen were posted all round the workshop like sentries.
sentences.cn: 全班管车们像步哨似的布防在全车间.

sentences.en: The workers in this workshop do day and night shifts in weekly rotation.
sentences.cn: 这个车间的工人上白班和上夜班每周轮换一次.

sentences.en: There'll be another plenary at the end of the afternoon after the workshop.
sentences.cn: 今天下午五六点钟在研讨会结束后还有一次全体会议。

sentences.en: This place would do for a workshop.
This workshop melts down the metal scrap.
Trumpeter Marcus Belgrave ran a jazz workshop for young artists.
sentences.cn: 鼓手马库斯马贝尔格瑞夫为年轻艺术家们举办了一场爵士乐研讨会。

sentences.en: We shut off the motor before we left the workshop.
sentences.cn: 我们离开车间以前把马达关掉了.

words.tran_cn: [工业]车间；研讨会；[工经]工场；讲习班

trans.tran_en: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things
